BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.audit.exception.SQLAuditException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.exception.UnsupportedDataTypeConversionException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.exception.UnsupportedStreamCharsetConversionException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
This random generator (java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom) is predictable

ExecutorService org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.kernel.thread.ExecutorServiceManager.SHUTDOWN_EXECUTOR is instantiated, but never shutdown, potentially preventing the entire JVM from shutting down
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.context.ExecutionUnit.hashCode() stores return result in local before immediately returning it
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.context.SQLUnit.hashCode() stores return result in local before immediately returning it
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.SQLExecutorExceptionHandler.lambda$static$0() needlessly boxes a boolean constant

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.driver.jdbc.JDBCExecutorCallback.getDataSourceMetaData(DatabaseMetaData, DatabaseType) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.driver.jdbc.JDBCExecutorCallback defines static field "org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.driver.jdbc.JDBCExecutorCallback.CACHED_DATASOURCE_METADATA" which appears to allow memory bloat
Non derivable method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.raw.callback.RawSQLExecutorCallback.execute(Collection, boolean) declares throwing an exception that isn't thrown

Inherited method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.stream.JDBCStreamQueryResult.getCalendarValue(int, Class, Calendar) returns more specific type of object than declared

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertNumberValue(Object, Class) is excessively complex, with a cyclomatic complexity of 61
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertURL(Object) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertURL(Object) throws alternative exception from catch block without history

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertValue(Object, Class) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertBooleanValue(Object) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertNullValue(Class) needlessly boxes a boolean constant

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertByteArrayValue(Object, Class) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertDateValue(Object, Class) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertLocalDateTimeValue(Object, Class) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertNumberValue(Object, Class) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertTimestampValue(Object, Class) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertDateValue(Object, Class) returns more specific type of object than declared
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.driver.jdbc.type.util.ResultSetUtils.convertNullValue(Class) returns more specific type of object than declared

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.result.query.impl.raw.type.RawMemoryQueryResult(QueryResultMetaData, List): 2nd parameter 'rows' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.log.SQLLogger.logSimpleMode(Collection) uses suboptimal sizing to allocate a collection

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.prepare.AbstractExecutionPrepareEngine holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.prepare.AbstractExecutionPrepareEngine.decorators, but uses it as only a List

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.prepare.driver.DriverExecutionPrepareEngine.createExecutionGroup(String, List, Object, ConnectionMode): 2nd parameter 'sqlUnits' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.prepare.raw.RawExecutionPrepareEngine.createExecutionGroup(String, List, ConnectionMode): 2nd parameter 'sqlUnitGroup' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
